FuncDef:
The crl update-period command sets the interval of the CRL automatic update function.
The undo crl update-period command restores the default interval of the CRL automatic update function.
By default, the interval of the CRL automatic update function is 8 hours.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interval of the CRL automatic update function.
It is an integer ranging from 1 to 720, in hours.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To manually adjust the interval for CRL automatic update, run the crl update-period command.
